body_html:
I guess. I did the following to generate the source tarball (btw, would you consider providing tarball with the submodule included ?)

git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git
cd pytorch/
git checkout v0.3.0
cd ..
tar --transform "s/^pytorch/pytorch-0.3.0+debian/" --exclude-vcs
-cvzf pytorch-0.3.0+debian.tar.gz pytorch

But maybe there's something broken with submodule version, let me check.

Adam.

body:
I guess. I did the following to generate the source tarball (btw, would you consider providing tarball with the submodule included ?)

 git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git
 cd pytorch/
 git checkout v0.3.0
 cd ..
 tar --transform "s/^pytorch/pytorch-0.3.0+debian/" --exclude-vcs \
   -cvzf pytorch-0.3.0+debian.tar.gz pytorch

But maybe there's something broken with submodule version, let me check.

Adam.
